frontmatter.title: We're back and talking about thermal rulers
Exploring Plutonium, Fission, and the Chilling Tale of the Demon Core! ‚ò¢Ô∏èüìú
frontmatter.description: In episode 003 of OSMOSISCAST, Jamie McMillan and Calum Morris embark on a journey through the annals of atomic history as we delve into the mysteries of plutonium, fission, and the haunting legend of the Demon Core.
